data.description: Render CGI form input as XML
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module performs a similar function to the above modules,
    however it generates XML to a fixed schema irrespective of the form
    input, thus enabling a web designer to create forms with any fields
    without necessarily having to request changes to the processing
    programs, the intent is that the XML will be passed to a message
    oriented middleware and thence to one or more applications.
